text:
[Verse]
City streets are glowing
Under the neon lights
People keep on moving
Chasing dreams through the night

[Verse 2]
Heartbeat like a drum
Echoes through the crowd
Lost but feeling found
Voices talking loud

[Chorus]
Under the neon lights
Everything's alright
Dance until the morning
Shine through the night

[Verse 3]
Downtown shadows play
Night into day
Bright colors sway
In a dazzling display

[Chorus]
Under the neon lights
Everything's alright
Dance until the morning
Shine through the night

[Bridge]
Stars above are clear
Music in the air
Everyone is here
No worries no care
title: Under the Neon Lights
